text: Hi <@UGX3UC01G> Welcome to the party! - I would recommend having some relationships with good developers for when you need some custom work. You can post in the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> forum to see who's available. :slightly_smiling_face:

Welcome <@UGWV752MA> :wave: We're very excited to have you a part of our CMS developer community! Great to hear you're already using some of the other :sprocket: tools.

This slack will be a great place to help get you coding on the CMS. How has your CMS experience been so far?

HI <@UEYV6TEAU> - This would be a good question to post in the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel. :slightly_smiling_face:

We do have a contacts API that will allow you to pull/update contact properties. You can learn more here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/contacts-overview>
Hi <@UH0SGP10V> - welcome to the HubSpot CMS Developer community. We're excited to have you :bmo:

Hi Luke! 

Yeah, we use HubSpot for almost everything. Growth suite it is. :) 

It’s been great! Trying some new things. :D

Hi there! I’m Melissa. I manage the corporate website at my company and now I’ve been thrown a new ‘toy’ {HubSpot} my way:slightly_smiling_face:
Looking forward to any or every possible piece of advice I can get my hands on to get started
